text:
Created attachment 34359
dashboard screenshot

issue: in case of multiple different failure types it is not clear what error code corresponds to specific request. Statistics table displays percentage of failed requests(without specifying error codes) and Error table displays error codes(without specifying corresponding requests).

example image attached: it is not quite clear what type of error corresponds to failed /entitlement request.
creator: sizemski@axinom.com

text:
Hello,
There has been an enhancement to the report which you can see in nightly build , see also Bug 60065.

But I am not sure this answer fully your request.
Do you have an idea of expected presentation ? As there can be a lot of different errors for a particular request.

Regards
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com

text:
Created attachment 34364
error list on hover
creator: sizemski@axinom.com

text:
Not sure what is the best way to handle variety of different errors.
One possible option is to display error list when hovering over KO cell in statistic table (image attached).
creator: sizemski@axinom.com
p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
Hello,
The Top5 errors per sampler seems a way to do what was suggested here.

So I am closing this one as duplicate.
@reporter, if you disagree feel free to reopen with additional ideas.
Thanks
